ComicInfo.Penciller: Arturo Lauria,Pablo Clark,Craig Rousseau,Dennis Calero,Stephen Green,Mark Nelson,Arturo Lauria,Craig Rousseau,Pablo Clark,Dennis Calero,Stephen Green,Mark Nelson
ComicInfo.Summary:
Eisner, Harvey, and Stumptown award-winner!
In a dream-oriented story that follows up on the correspondence Hellboy sent Abe Sapien in “The Chained Coffin,” Abe responds to some of Hellboy’s advice in a story by John Arcudi and Mark Nelson. Meet Donny Cates and Eliot Rahal’s The Paybacks—the repo men superheroes really don’t want to meet—in a prologue to their upcoming series! Witchcraft comes to mob land in Fabian Rangel Jr. and Pablo Clark’s Black Past! Survive an exotic sci-fi jungle full of dangers in Rich Woodall and Craig Rousseau’s Kyrra: Alien Jungle Girl!
Plus, new chapters of Ken Pisani’s Colonus and Dennis Calero’s The Suit!
*Contents* Abe Sapien: Subconscious The Paybacks: Downhill Ski The Suit: Bad Day at the Office, Chapter 2 Black Past: Blood, Chapter 1 Kyrra, Alien Jungle Girl, Chapter 1: No More Waiting for a New Day Colonus, Chapter 2: Remember the Fives
